verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:16
verses.text: And they buried him in the city of David among the kings, because he had done good in Israel, both toward God, and toward his house.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:17
verses.text: Now after the death of Jehoiada came the princes of Judah, and made obeisance to the king. Then the king hearkened unto them.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 24:18
verses.text: And they left the house of the Lord God of their fathers, and served groves and idols: and wrath came upon Judah and Jerusalem for this their trespass.
